description: Styling definitions for a carousel component including layout, responsive design, and button styling.

classes.name: kavia-carousel-root
classes.description: Main container for the carousel component, includes layout properties.

classes.name: kavia-carousel-track
classes.description: Container for the slides, handles the track layout.

classes.name: kavia-carousel-slide
classes.description: Individual slide in the carousel, styled for alignment and spacing.

classes.name: kavia-carousel-arrows
classes.description: Container for navigation buttons of the carousel.

classes.name: kavia-carousel-dots
classes.description: Container for pagination dots representing the slides.
